name: df-bnj19
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(w-bnj19(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c-bnj14(cv(s0), c1, c2), c0)))
comment: Define the following predicate: ` B ` is transitive for ` A ` and ` R ` . (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
